title: Create Glow Maxing beauty product website with detailed product information

requirements.text: Create a hero section prominently featuring the Glow Maxing product name, tagline highlighting the 7-day results promise, and a compelling call-to-action

quotes: I want website for a beauty product. And the name of product (glow maxing). product result in 7 dayes

acceptanceCriteria: Hero section displays 'Glow Maxing' as the main product name
Clear mention of '7-day results' is visible in the hero area

requirements.text: Create a detailed product benefits section showcasing how Glow Maxing delivers facial glow and removes blackheads and whiteheads

quotes: Glow in face and remove all black and witheheadss

acceptanceCriteria: Section clearly lists facial glow enhancement as a key benefit
Benefits are presented with visual appeal and clear descriptions

requirements.text: Implement a 7-day results timeline section that visually demonstrates the product's effectiveness progression from day 1 to day 7
acceptanceCriteria: Timeline shows clear progression across 7 days
Each day includes description of expected results
Visual presentation makes the timeline easy to follow

requirements.text: Create a comprehensive product details section with information about ingredients, usage instructions, and product specifications

quotes: Create a website full of details

acceptanceCriteria: Presents information in an organized, scannable format

requirements.text: Design a visually cohesive beauty and skincare themed interface with a fresh, clean aesthetic that emphasizes radiance and clarity, using warm glowing tones, soft gradients, and elegant typography throughout all sections
acceptanceCriteria: Color scheme evokes freshness, glow, and skincare wellness
Visual style is consistent across all sections

nonGoals: Backend data storage for product information
Real customer testimonials or reviews system
